EmailTemplate.name: 201710_EMEAI_Nuture_ComHelo_HAPP_JC.201710_EMEAI_Nuture_ComHelo_HAPP_ EMAIL3_ENG
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell HAPP can Help You!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> NEWS | HELICOPTER HOW CAN HAPP HELP YOU? Honeywell Avionics Protection Plan (HAPP) has been designed to get you back in the air with ease. Check out the benefits of jumping on board.
Customer Benefits:
- Exchange and repairs on Honeywell Avionics - No-charge loaners - 24/7 AOG emergency service - Paid airfreight (International) - Factory-backed support identical to your original factory warranty - Field support system includes a global network of supply depots and service centres - Fixed price with annual contract - Fleet and High Flight Hour Discounts - No buy in fee - Fully transferable agreements
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/helohapp]]>
If you don't have Honeywell avionics, please click <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/NonHONAVNX_ComHelo_HAPP.html]]> here.
